definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
lit. extreme saturation (idiom)/fig. vividly and thoroughly/in great detail/without restraint/(of a performance) brilliant
to get wet in the rain

sentences.english: Circulated air design keeps shower area clean in non-shower state.
sentences.chinese: 循環風設計，保證非吹淋狀態下風淋區內的潔淨度。

sentences.english: Both young and old like ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 不論老少都喜歡喫冰淋。

sentences.english: Today, Lin Lin in the rain outside the window again.
The amount of nitrogen leached from sand soil exceed in that from clay soil.
sentences.chinese: 沙質土壤中氮素的淋失量明顯高於粘質土壤。

sentences.english: The rain may be because, the relationship between Cui Huadun launched a high fever.
sentences.chinese: 也許是因爲淋了雨的關係，崔華盾發起了高燒。

sentences.english: The adsorption reaction is quick and the adsorption capacity is large.
sentences.chinese: 實驗表明，此萃淋樹脂吸附快，吸附容量大。

sentences.english: If you don't, I shall pour water on you.
sentences.chinese: 你不肯的話，我就拿水來淋你。

sentences.english: Pour the above sauce over the chicken. Ready to serve.
sentences.chinese: 將以上汁料淋在雞件上，即可上桌。

sentences.english: Please give me an ice-cream and two rices.
sentences.chinese: 請給我一份冰琪淋和兩份飯。

sentences.english: Stir together powdered sugar and water to make of pouring consistency. Drizzle over the cake and sprinkle the almonds on it.
sentences.chinese: 把糖粉和水混合後淋在蛋糕上，灑上杏仁片即可。

sentences.english: He has never eaten any ice cream in all his life.
sentences.chinese: 他這一輩子就沒有喫過冰棋淋。

sentences.english: Moon Bridge Special Over Rice with beef, peas, egg white and cornstarch over rice.
sentences.chinese: 月亮橋什燴飯以牛肉及青豆燴蛋白淋於白飯之上。

sentences.english: There are some ice-cream men going about.
sentences.chinese: 賣冰琪淋的人在旁邊走動。

sentences.english: Just letting the cool water hit your face washes off the grime and stresses of the day.
sentences.chinese: 讓冷水在淋在臉上會沖走一天的困頓和壓力。

sentences.english: A wanderer who is determined to reach his destination does not fear the rain.
sentences.chinese: 決計趕到目的地，浪漢何懼雨來淋。

sentences.english: Pour the egg paste onto the steamed flower crab.
sentences.chinese: 把蛋漿淋在已蒸過的花蟹上。

definition: to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
to remove evil/to cleanse/to wash away
cold water/unboiled water/fig. not yet ready (of plans)
